thread.title: Man dies in Birmingham M6 crash
thread.title_full: Man dies in Birmingham M6 crash | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Man dies in Birmingham M6 crash
text:
A collision involving two lorries on the M6 in Birmingham this morning has left one man dead and another needing hospital treatment.
West Midlands Ambulance Service was called to the southbound carriageway of the M6 between junctions 4 and 4a just before 9.15am this morning.
An ambulance, a paramedic area support officer, a BASICS doctor and the Midlands Air Ambulance from Cosford with a MERIT trauma doctor on board attended the scene.
"When ambulance staff arrived they found two lorries which had been involved in a serious collision.
One lorry was carrying two tonnes of bricks and had shed its load onto the carriageway."
â€“ A West Midlands Ambulance Service spokeswoman Last updated Tue 7 Jul 2015 Travel Birmingham West Midlands
